backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI modification features and affected files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing purpose of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and dark mode adjustments.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode, loading fonts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/postcss.config.cjs: PostCSS config enabling Tailwind and autoprefixer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering hero, navigation, sections, and menu using animations and dynamic content.
frontend/src/components/LocationMapPrevi: Map preview with iframe embedding, loading state, and fallback card when embed fails.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryGrid: Renders a menu category title and grid of animated MenuItemCard components.
frontend/src/components/MenuItemCard.tsx: Displays a menu item card with pricing and opens WhatsApp order links, including variant selection via dialog.
frontend/src/components/RevealableSectio: Wraps content in a Section and renders only when the section is marked as revealed.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Renders an image that swaps to a fallback source if loading fails and resets on src change.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Provides a styled section wrapper with background variants and fade-in animation.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Renders the fixed site header with logo and scrollable navigation buttons.
frontend/src/content/business.ts: Centralized business config including branding, menu data, social links, images, and WhatsApp settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealableSections: Tracks and controls which page section is revealed and scrolls to top on section change.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Functions to derive variant pricing options for menu items and generate WhatsApp order links using business configuration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and utility settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing requirements, branding updates, menu logic, ordering flow, and known issues.
